text: Rita Ora took to the stage at the O2 Academy in Glasgow for a show on Friday, after her fellow singer Hayley Kiyoko said she's not a fan of Ora's latest single, titled Girls. Kiyoko, 27, said in a quote on social media Friday that the new song - which features Cardi B, Charli XCX and Bebe Rexha - is'just downright tone - deaf'and'does more harm than good for the LGBTQ + community.'The Curious artist said that after listening to the track, she was'overwhelmed with thoughts,'saying she felt'a song like this just fuels the male gaze while marginalizing the idea of women loving women.
